# GITHUB ACTIONS WORKFLOW - AUTO DEPLOYMENT
# Purpose: Automatically deploy worker on push to main branch

name: Deploy to Cloudflare Workers

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    name: Deploy
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '18'
      
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm install
        working-directory: ./workers/buildnest/buildnest-orchestrator
      
      - name: Deploy to Cloudflare Workers
        uses: cloudflare/wrangler-action@v3
        with:
          apiToken: ${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN }}
          workingDirectory: ./workers/buildnest/buildnest-orchestrator

- Halt all MonsterOmni active processes
- Queue ToyNest deployment requests
- Lock Pebble Lattice at 92.09999% efficiency

# HOLD Phase (3-second stabilization)
- Verify Scooter Engine payload integrity
- Confirm Baobab Ignition Set™ readiness
- Initialize Rolla-Ball Socket #2 connection pool

# READ Phase
- FAAC Architect 4.5.1 scans Alibaba supplier database
- Extract: supplier_id, certifications[], pricing_model{}
- Cross-reference against 15% Care Loop threshold

# UNDERSTAND Phase (95% comprehension gate)
- Validate supplier compliance (boolean: true/false)
- Assess supply chain ethics score (0-100)
- Confirm zero-exploitation labor practices
- Gate condition: comprehension_score >= 95%

# GO Phase
- Scooter Engine executes bulk procurement order
- Rolla-Ball Socket #2 transmits order to Alibaba API
- Generate 6 Global Barcodes (Banimal Loop)
- Populate Cargo Manifest for distribution tracking

        run: npm install
        working-directory: ./workers/buildnest/buildnest-orchestrator
      
      - name: Deploy to Cloudflare Workers
        uses: cloudflare/wrangler-action@v3
        with:
          apiToken: ${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN }}
          workingDirectory: ./workers/buildnest/buildnest-orchestrator

name: Deploy to Cloudflare Workers

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    name: Deploy HotStack Worker
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          cache: 'npm'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Deploy to Cloudflare Workers
        uses: cloudflare/wrangler-action@v3
        with:
          apiToken: ${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN }}
          accountId: ${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID }}
          command: deploy

      - name: Deployment Success
        run: |
          echo "✅ Deployment successful!"
          echo "🌐 Live at: https://hotstack.faa.zone"

/brands:
  - GET /list (with filters)
  - GET /{brand_id}/details
  - GET /{brand_id}/completeness
  - POST /{brand_id}/update

/files:
  - GET /search?query={}&brand={}&sector={}
  - GET /{file_id}/metadata
  - POST /upload

/repositories:
  - GET /list
  - GET /{repo_id}/status
  - POST /sync

/contacts:
  - GET /search
  - GET /{contact_id}
  - POST /deduplicate

Cluster Configuration:
  Total Nodes: 4
  Node Type: CPX11 (Cloud Instance)
  
Per-Node Specs:
  vCPU: 2 cores (AMD EPYC/Intel Xeon)
  RAM: 2 GB
  Storage: 40 GB NVMe SSD
  Network: 20 TB transfer/month
  IPv4: 1 dedicated IP per node
  IPv6: /64 subnet
  
Coolify Role Assignment:
  Node 1: Coolify Manager + Primary Database
  Node 2: Worker Node (Frontend Services)
  Node 3: Worker Node (Backend APIs)
  Node 4: Worker Node (Queue/Background Jobs)

Inbound Rules:
     - Port 22 (SSH): Your IP only
     - Port 80 (HTTP): 0.0.0.0/0
     - Port 443 (HTTPS): 0.0.0.0/0
     - Port 6001 (Coolify): Cluster IPs only
     - Port 6002 (Coolify WebSocket): Cluster IPs only
   
   Outbound: Allow all (for package downloads)

# Firewall Rules: "coolify-security-rules"
Inbound:
  - SSH (22): YOUR_IP_ONLY
  - HTTP (80): 0.0.0.0/0
  - HTTPS (443): 0.0.0.0/0
  - Coolify Manager (6001): CLUSTER_IPS_ONLY
  - Coolify WebSocket (6002): CLUSTER_IPS_ONLY
  - Docker Swarm (2377): CLUSTER_IPS_ONLY
  - Docker Container Network (7946): CLUSTER_IPS_ONLY
  - Docker Overlay Network (4789): CLUSTER_IPS_ONLY

Outbound:
  - All traffic: ALLOW (for package downloads)

HotStack Autonomous Flow:
  1. Omnidrop (File Upload):
     - User uploads brand documentation → HotStack HIL
     - VaultLink™ Protocol triggers → LicenseVault API
     - Brand metadata extracted → PostgreSQL database
     - File stored → Cloudflare R2
  
  2. Collapse (Deployment):
     - Git push detected → GitHub webhook
     - Coolify receives trigger → LicenseVault deployed
     - Database migrated → Hetzner PostgreSQL
     - Service live → 180-second deployment
  
  3. Brand Query Flow:
     - Frontend requests brand data → LicenseVault API
     - API queries → PostgreSQL (13,713 brands)
     - Response cached → Cloudflare CDN
     - Delivered to client → <100ms latency

version: '3.8'

services:
  licensevault:
    build: .
    container_name: licensevault-app
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    environment:
      - DATABASE_URL=${DATABASE_URL}
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - CLOUDFLARE_R2_ENDPOINT=${CLOUDFLARE_R2_ENDPOINT}
      - CLOUDFLARE_R2_ACCESS_KEY=${CLOUDFLARE_R2_ACCESS_KEY}
      - CLOUDFLARE_R2_SECRET_KEY=${CLOUDFLARE_R2_SECRET_KEY}
    depends_on:
      - postgres
    networks:
      - licensevault-network
    volumes:
      - ./logs:/app/logs

  postgres:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: licensevault-db
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_DB=licensevault
      - POSTGRES_USER=licensevault
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./server/db/init.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sql
    networks:
      - licensevault-network
    ports:
      - "5432:5432"

networks:
  licensevault-network:
    driver: bridge

volumes:
  postgres_data:

banimal-sync:
  name: Banimal Ecosystem Sync
  needs: workers-deploy
  runs-on: ubuntu-latest
  steps:
    - name: Trigger Banimal Supply Chain
      run: |
        curl -X POST https://banimal.faa.zone/wp-json/banimal/v1/automated-supply \
          -H "Authorization: Bearer ${{ secrets.BANIMAL_API_KEY }}" \
          -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
          -d '{"ecosystem": "omnigrid", "chess_move": "${{ github.event.head_commit.message }}"}'
